an6.43:3.3: BB includes the extra phrase “nago vata bho nago” here, however, it is absent from most editions so I don’t include it.
an6.43:3.15: By using monstrous I am trying to echo the pun in the text. Not very good, perhaps, but neither is the original!
an6.43:5.1: My translation here follows, with a few adjustments, my earlier translation of Thag 15.2.
an6.43:17.1: BB has “well-born”, but I suspect lokesu is merely a locative plural metri causa. The parallel line in Tag 15.2 lacks su, inserting a ca instead.
